question: i am a type 1 diabetic and currently taking clenbuterol. just wondering how it will affect my humulog & humulin n consumption. i have been on it for 3 days & i am up to 2 pills a day. started feeling the sides today with what seemed to be my body resisting insulin therefor forcing me to do more. just wondering if ne1 has more info on clen & diabetes. thanxxxxx
title: clenbuterol and diabetes
